Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 69th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1972...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Diablo on 1/31/1975 (Going to SHP: 3B T. Hodapp. Going to DIA: P G. Sibley, 1B L. Pellegrino, 2B A. Diaz)...
Injured on 7/24/1978 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/7/1980, off Michael Rakes (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/19/1981, off Joseph Ping (Ash)...
Injured on 6/15/1984 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Gashouse on 7/26/1984...
Drove in 6 runs against West Texas on 7/7/1985...
